value: 1) Dos Hombres is a mezcal company co founded in 2019 by American actors Aaron Paul and Bryan Cranston.
2) The company produces artisanal mezcal which is distilled in small batches and does not use modern technology.
3) Dos Hombres is produced in San Luis del Río in Oaxaca, Mexico, and production is led by Gregorio Velasco.
4) The company offers two types of mezcal: Dos Hombres Espadin and Dos Hombres Tobala.
5) Dos Hombres provides several cocktail recipes on their website, including the Dos Hombres Sour, Dos Hombres Mule, Party Punch, and Sunrise in Oaxaca.
